source.fbf15d1a:
# Considering the Company Name only to be in Company Name

data['Company Name'] = data['Company Name'].apply(lambda x: x.splitlines()[0])
source.aa85b326:
# Let's find out the description of the Company having -1 as min salary
data[data['Salary Estimate']=='-1']
source.ab308668:
# Lets replace that with the approx value
data[data['Salary Estimate']=='-1'] = data[data['Salary Estimate']=='-1'].replace('-1', '$30K-$43K (Glassdoor est.)')
source.88a7a901:
data['Size'] = data['Size'].replace('Unknown', 'Not Given')
data['Revenue'] = data['Revenue'].replace('Unknown', 'Not Given')
source.57c33b71:
# Considering movie rating can't be negative
data = data.replace(-1,0)

source.fffed719:
# Salary Estimation
px.bar(data['Salary Estimate'].value_counts().reset_index(), 
      x='index',
      y="Salary Estimate",
      labels={'index':'Salary', 'Salary Estimate':'Jobs Available'},
      title="Salary Estimation",
      color="Salary Estimate")
source.349efc28:
# Various Companies offering the Job

px.bar(data[data['Company Name']!='Not Known'], 
       x='Company Name',
       title="Varios Companies Offering the Job")
source.855f3d1d:

            title='Number of Vacancis in Each Sector')
source.8648db17:

            color="Founded",

                 color="Rating", 
                 hover_data=['Headquarters','Location', 'Type of ownership', 'Industry', 'Sector', 'Salary Estimate'], 
                 title = "Details of the role, headquarters, salary etc for the Data Analyst Job")
fig.show()
source.1abe2914:
fig = go.Figure(data=go.Scatter(
y=data['Location'],
mode='markers',
marker=dict(
size=12,
color=data['Rating'],
colorscale='Viridis',
showscale=True)))

fig.update_layout(title="Company Size and Job",
                 yaxis_title='Location')
fig.show()

source.1269cc5a:
In this notebook, I have analyzed the dataset and have visualized the dataset. In this dataset there are different countries having Data Analyst Jobs in different Locations. The dataset has following colmns :

* Unnamed: 0
* Job Title
* Salary Estimate
* Job Description
* Rating
* Company Name
* Location
* Headquarters
* Size
* Founded
* Type of ownership
* Industry
* Sector
* Revenue
* Competitors
* Easy Apply
source.17545ed2: Every column has unique values for the minimum and maximum of Salary except for the which has minimum value of '-1'
source.e1c85a41: There is 171 rows with '-1' value for their Heaquartes site which is not making sense, we willreplace all these '-1' values with 'Not Given'
source.136908c5: One can clearly see from the outcomes of the last 2 cell that in Company name we have unnecessarily added the rating value inspite of having the Rating Column
